comment: Honestly by far the worst professor I ever had. I learned almost nothing and I got a B grade but I failed all the exams because it does not reflect what we learned and curving means nothing to me. I am here to learn.

Terrible, lectures are terrible, doesn't really give clear instructions for assignments. He doesn't even know how to do the assignments until students started complaining how about unclear it was.
Lectures covers too many topics and he doesn't make clear the exact topics that he will cover in the test.
Too slow to respond to emails.

The course covers theories behind machine learning. You don't just learn writing code for data analysis projects, but also figure out theories behind the algorithms. If you pay much attention to what Dr. Lo presents in the class, you will get a lot of concepts in machine learning. He reponses email from D2L. You may not get his reponse outside D2L.
The lectures are reasonable and easy to understand. You need to review lecture slides carefully before taking test. Overall, it is a good class.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Lots of homework--Group projects

comment: Online class has no structure & he does not give timely detailed feedback. Despite saying on his syllabus to email him through D2L, he does not respond, & I have emailed him three times thus far, no response.

Dr. Lo has been the least caring instructor I've ever had. He hardly bothers to respond to emails about grades or projects. He put me in a group with a non-existing student which set me back. After my withdrawal from the course he had the gull to send me a passive aggressive response. I also received no teaching, only recordings. Regret it
very nice but incredibly unclear about everything - expectations and course content

the highest grade for the first test was a 76...  most people failed the group project... labs were useless... lectures were even more... sit in the first row to understand... not a good teacher... takes attendance when there are less people... puts you on the spot if you are on a computer... very nosy... but guess what, HUGE CURVE.. made an A!!!!!

This is by far the worst class I have ever taken in my life. There is no organization whatsoever. I came in to this class excited to learn about circuits and hardware and that sort of things and this horrible class completely crushed my enthusiasm. The tests don't match the material at all. I only received an A due to a huge class-wide curve.
I took this class as a hybrid, the recorded lectures were useless, and the book almost so. The course itself was very disorganized, the labs didn't line up with the lectures. Very poor

I have to take one of his 'hybrid' classes where basically the lecture portion of the class is all online. It's very difficult to understand what he's saying through the combination of his accent and terrible audio quality. I don't know what's wrong with his microphone but it's terrible. Also, his required book for the course is written by him

Dr. Lo was my teacher for Comp Org&Arch, and that subject itself was not very easy. He knew it was not easy also, so he would do everything and anything to help us understand the subject more easily, and was always there in his office when I needed his help. Yes, his accent can be an issue, but he's still a great teacher, and a great person
The course contains a lot of topics. If you spend time, you will gain more. The professor is not bad.

He is a friendly person. But the course is not organized well. It has too much fragmented Parts. For this 8 week course, he requires students to do 6 homework, 6 terrible labs, 5 quizzes, and mid and final. too much work. no help for the labs.I do not recommend the professor and the course for anyone, It is a waste of time and money.

One of the worst teachers that I have ever had, and that is saying a lot since I am a senior with a previous degree under my belt. saving grace is that all quizzes are open book, but god forbid you actually need to communicate with this professor unless you can speak broken English or Mandarin. Stay on top of grade calculation. Mine was wrong a lot
If you memorize the quizzes, you will get an A
